item.title: 562 yell command help!
item.dc:creator: @CreatorAlex CreatorAlex
item.description:
@CreatorAlex wrote:

Here’s one for rs2hd bases.

[code] if(cmd[0].startsWith("::yell")){
if (GameEngine.mute.isMuted(player.getUsername())){
player.sm(“You are muted. If you want to be unmuted appeal on the forums.”);
return;
}
String yellText = command.substring(5);
yellText = Censor.Replace(yellText);

		for(Player p : World.getInstance().getPlayerList()) {
			if (player.getUsername().equals("####")) {
				p.getActionSender().sendMessage("[Owner]<img=1><shad=0B6138>"+player.getUsername()+": "+Misc.optimizeText(yellText));
			}
                            if(player.getRights() == 1) {
                                            p.getActionSender().sendMessage("[Player-Mod]<img=0><col=0174DF>"+player.getUsername()+": "+Misc.optimizeText(yellText));
			}
                            if(player.getRights() == 0) {
                                            p.getActionSender().sendMessage("[Player]"+player.getUsername()+": "+Misc.optimizeText(yellText));
			}
		}
	}
	
	}[/code]

Add it in CommandsPacketHandler and replace #### with your ingame name.

Read full topic
